column1: #Text=This repository contains the implementation of the paper ["EC-GAN: Low-Sample Classification using Semi-Supervised Algorithms and GANs"](https://arxiv.org/abs/2012.15864) by Ayaan Haque from Saratoga High School.

column1: #Text=Our proposed model combines a Generative Adversarial Network with a classifier to leverage artifical GAN generations to increase the size of restricted, fully-supervised datasets in a semi-supervised method.
#Text=Semi-supervised learning has been gaining attention as it allows for performing image analysis tasks such as classification with limited labeled data.
#Text=      title={EC-GAN: Low-Sample Classification using Semi-Supervised Algorithms and GANs},
#Text=      journal={Proceedings of the AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence},
